answers.answer: why are you getting induced so early?   i was induced at 41+5 with the pessary but it didn't work, so had my waters broken artificially at 41+6 and had baby boy exactly two weeks late x
I have gestational diabetes with this pregnancy so they are inducing me early

ah i see, i had a 9.5 hour labour after they broke my waters, unfortunately i ended up having to got an emergency c  section but that would have been the same if i had had a natural birth as well. good luck :-) x

question: Just got a call I'm scheduled for induction next Monday I will be 38+2 so super excited but sniper nervous!!! My son I went into labor on my own so I'm nervous about being induced!!! Any ladies that were induced before would love to hear your experience?
title: induction!!!!
